items.content_html: A real-time, browser-based geolocation tracking app built with Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO. Users can share their live location, see others on an interactive Leaflet map, and jump to any user's position instantly. Built for fast, lightweight performance with automatic user synchronization and dynamic user lists.
items.title: rushit-kakadiya/real-time-location-tracking-app: A real-time, browser-based geolocation tracking app built with Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO. Users can share their live location, see others on an interactive Leaflet map, and jump to any user's position instantly. Built for fast, lightweight performance with automatic user synchronization and dynamic user lists.
